participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

ksads_dp_raw_105_t.Description: You said that in the past two weeks for most of the day you felt annoyed, irritable, or cranky. When did this begin?

ksads_dp_raw_115_t.Description: You said that in the past there was a time that lasted at least two weeks when for most of the day you felt sad or down, and bored, like nothing was fun. When was that? If you felt that way more than once, let me know when it was the worst.

ksads_dp_raw_114_t.Description: You said that in the past there was a time that lasted at least two weeks when for most of the day you felt sad and irritable. When was that? If you felt that way more than once, let me know when it was the worst.

ksads_dp_raw_113_t.Description: You said that in the past there was a time that lasted at least two weeks when for most of the day you felt bored, like nothing was fun. When was that? If you felt that way more than once, let me know when it was the worst.

ksads_dp_raw_112_t.Description: You said that in the past there was a time that lasted at least two weeks when for most of the day you felt irritable, or cranky. When was that? If you felt that way more than once, let me know when it was the worst.

ksads_dp_raw_111_t.Description: You said that in the past there was a time that lasted at least two weeks when for most of the day you felt sad or down. When was that? If you felt that way more than once, let me know when it was the worst.

ksads_dp_raw_110_t.Description: You said that in the past two weeks for most of the day you felt sad, irritable and bored. When did this begin?

ksads_dp_raw_861_t.Description: In the past when you were feeling irritable, did you gain some weight? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_104_t.Description: You said that in the past two weeks for most of the day you felt sad or down. When did this begin?

ksads_dp_raw_103_t.Description: Was there ever another time in the past that you felt bored, like nothing was fun for most of the day, nearly every day, for two weeks or longer? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_102_t.Description: Was there ever a time in the past that you felt bored, like nothing was fun for most of the day, nearly every day, for two weeks or longer? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_101_t.Description: In the past 2 weeks, how often have you felt bored, or like nothing was fun, for most of the day? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_dp_raw_100_t.Description: Was there ever another time in the past that you felt, annoyed, irritable, or cranky for most of the day, nearly every day, for two weeks or longer? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_99_t.Description: Was there ever a time in the past that you felt, annoyed, irritable, or cranky for most of the day, nearly every day, for two weeks or longer? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_98_t.Description: In the past two weeks, how often have you felt annoyed, irritable, or cranky, with the cranky feeling lasting most of the day? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_dp_raw_97_t.Description: Was there ever another time in the past that you felt sad or down for most of the day, nearly every day, for two weeks or longer? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_96_t.Description: Was there ever a time in the past that you felt sad or down for most of the day, nearly every day, for two weeks or longer? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_95_t.Description: Now I'd like to ask you some questions about your mood. In the past two weeks, how often have you felt sad, down, or depressed, with the down feeling lasting most of the day? </br> | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_dp_raw_117_t.Description: You said that in the past there was a time that lasted at least two weeks when for most of the day you felt sad, irritable, and bored. When was that? If you felt that way more than once, let me know when it was the worst.

ksads_dp_raw_860_t.Description: Since you have been irritable and bored, have you gained any weight? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_859_t.Description: When you were feeling irritable in the past, did you often eat more than usual? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_858_t.Description: In the past two weeks, have you been especially hungry, craving sweets, or eating more than usual? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_dp_raw_857_t.Description: In the past when you were feeling irritable, did you lose some weight? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_856_t.Description: Since your mood has changed, have you lost any weight? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_855_t.Description: In the past when you were feeling irritable, did you often find yourself less hungry than usual? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_854_t.Description: In the past two weeks, how often have you found yourself less hungry than usual? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_dp_raw_853_t.Description: In the past when you were feeling irritable, did you have a lot of trouble making up your mind about every day decisions like what to wear, eat or do? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_852_t.Description: In the past two weeks, how often have you had trouble making up your mind about everyday decisions like what to wear, eat, or do? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_dp_raw_851_t.Description: In the past when you were feeling irritable, did you have a lot of trouble concentrating? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_850_t.Description: I know you've had concentration problems for a long time. Did the problems with concentration get worse when your mood changed? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_849_t.Description: In the past two weeks, how often have you found it hard to concentrate? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_dp_raw_848_t.Description: In the past when you were feeling irritable a lot in June 2012, did you often feel tired, like you just didn't have enough energy to do the things you normally do? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_847_t.Description: In the past two weeks, how often have you felt tired, like you just didn't have enough energy to do the things you normally do? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_dp_raw_846_t.Description: In the past when you were feeling irritable a lot in June 2012, were you sleeping two or more hours a day more than usual, either napping during the day or sleeping more hours at night? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_845_t.Description: In the past 2 weeks, how often have you been sleeping two or more hours a day more than usual, either napping during the day or sleeping more hours at night? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_dp_raw_844_t.Description: You said in the past you felt cranky a lot in June 2012. I want you to think back to that time and let me know if, back then, you had any of these other problems. Back then, did you have a lot of trouble falling asleep or staying asleep at night? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dp_raw_118_t.Description: How long did it last back then?

ksads_dp_raw_116_t.Description: You said that in the past there was a time that lasted at least two weeks when for most of the day you felt irritable and bored, like nothing was fun. When was that? If you felt that way more than once, let me know when it was the worst.
